# Ignore node_modules directories in each sub-project
/backend/node_modules/
news_project/frontend/node_modules/
news_project/mobile/node_modules/

weather_project/frontend/node_modules/
weather_project/mobile/node_modules/

# Ignore virtual environment folder
weather_project/venv/
news_project/newsvenv/

# Ignore build output directories
/build
/dist

# Ignore IDE and OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore environment variables and config files
*.env
*.env.local
*.env.*.local

# Other common exclusions
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Exclude any other common files/folders
*.log
